author: Aila Slisco
title: Graham Urges Biden to 'Personally' Take Action Against 'War Criminal' Putin
description: Graham said that Biden should be "personally" punishing "Putin and his cronies" for attacking Ukraine.
content: Senator Lindsey Graham (R-S.C.) called for Russian President Vladimir Putin to be "personally" punished over invading Ukraine on Thursday. Graham is pictured during a news conference at the Capitol iâ€¦ [+3345 chars]
